text: This inviting 3 Bedroom 2 Bath Cavco manufactured home offers peaceful country living on a beautifully landscaped 1.1527 acre lot. The home offers comfortable living space, outer rooms feature large windows all the way around, and a wrap around porch offering a beautiful serene mountain views, and multiple rooms for space to grow. This property is also zoned for RV use, creating potential for RV parking or even an RV park. With its prime location, ample water rights, and zoning flexibility, this property is ideal for farming, ranching, or other agricultural opportunities. Own a Piece of Arizona History - The Olney House & Cottage Bed and Breakfast- Now is your chance to own a timeless historical property with incredible charm, income potential, and deep roots in the community. Originally known as The Olney House, this iconic residence-currently operating as The Cottage Bed & Breakfast-offers over 4,200 sq. ft. of unique and versatile space spread across multiple buildings on over 1/3 of an acre. Built in 1890, this property blends master craftsmanship with modern versatility, and is surrounded by lush porches, shade trees, and garden charm. Property Features: The Main House is set up as a two-bedroom, one-bath apartment upstairs with open-concept living and dining areas. The downstairs features an additional 1-b 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom suite, a full kitchen, and a separate living areawith the possibility of converting two other rooms into bedrooms for expanded functionality. The Cottage A charming 420 sq. ft. 1 bed, 1 bath guest house with an open living/dining layout, ideal for vacation rentals, guest accommodations, or extended family. Bakery/Kitchen Building-Another 420 sq. ft. structure, currently housing the Cottage Bakery. Equipped with a dedicated kitchen and storage, this space could be used as a commercial bakery, artist's studio, or additional rental unit. What Makes This Property Special *Income-Producing Potential - Live in one unit while renting the others, or operate as a full bed & breakfast. * Masterful Craftsmanship - Original details, solid construction, and timeless character throughout. *Outdoor Enjoyment - Covered porches, mature trees, and a peaceful atmosphere invite relaxation and connection. *Prime Location - Tucked in a desirable part of town with history and walkability. Whether you're looking to continue its legacy as a charming inn and bakery, convert it into a multi-unit rental, or simply enjoy the craftsmanship and space as your private residence, The Olney House Cottage Bed and Breakfast offers unmatched character and potential.

text: Exceptional Development Opportunity: Prime 24.31 Acres in Safford, AZ! Discover a remarkable investment prospect with this 24.31-acre property, newly rezoned to C-3, situated in the heart of Safford's thriving landscape. Located at the intersection of 8th Ave and Discovery, this prime site is just minutes from Downtown, schools, and directly adjacent to a future 15-acre city park, all while being a short drive from the expanding Freeport Mine. The breathtaking mountain views further enhance the appeal, making this location truly one-of-a-kind. Unlimited Development Potential: The C-3 zoning opens the door to a multitude of possibilities, making this an ideal canvas for visionary investors and developers. Whether your focus is on retail centers, convenience stores, gas stations, restaurants, office buildings, hospitality venues, medical facilities, housing subdivisions or multifamily housing, this property can accommodate the diverse needs of Safford's growing community. Adjacent to a New Community Hub: Enhancing the allure of this property is its proximity to a new 15-acre park being developed by the City of Safford. This state-of-the-art recreational space will include a splash pad, pickleball courts, an amphitheater, and playgrounds, creating a vibrant community hub that draws residents and visitors alike. The park's presence is a significant advantage, promising increased foot traffic and elevating the neighborhood atmosphere. Thriving Local Economy: Safford is experiencing robust growth, driven by the ongoing expansion of the Freeport Mine, which brings new jobs and stimulates economic activity in the area. With an increasing demand for housing and commercial developments, this property stands out as a timely investment opportunity. As the city enhances its infrastructure and embraces community development, this location is primed for substantial growth. Prime Location Near Downtown & Schools Strategically located near Downtown Safford and major educational institutions, this property is ideally positioned to meet the community's diverse needs. Whether you're looking to purchase and develop all or part this property for commercial, residential, or mixed-use projects, this site represents an unparalleled opportunity in a city rich with potential. Don't miss your chance to be part of Safford's exciting future!

text: Ranchettes For Sale. This offering presents a unique opportunity to acquire 80 +/- acres of highly productive farmland in one of Eastern Arizona's most scenic valleys. This property can be purchased as a single 80-acre parcel or divided into up to five parcels of approximately 16 acres each. Utilities, including water and electricity, are available on site. The land is conveniently located just off the highway, providing easy access to Safford and the surrounding area. This valley is renowned for its fertile soil, highly productive crops and exceptional views. Residents can enjoy a variety of outdoor activities nearby, such as ATV riding, hunting, hiking, fishing, and horseback riding or other equine activities. This property is ideally suited for those seeking a premier residential horse property, ranchette or highly productive farm in Eastern Arizona.

Unique 102-acre parcel is perfect for the minimalist, rancher, or outdoorsman! BLM land, campgrounds, hiking trails, and the Bonita Creek Gila Box Riparian National Conservation Area are just a quad ride away! At the top, you'll be greeted by panoramic views of the Gila Box! At the bottom, you'll find a domestic water well, former mobile home hook-ups, Brown Canal Easement, and direct access to private fishing holes! Lot lines appear to be close to the paved road and city water, but there is no legal easement or right of way at the top Bonita Creek Rd. *Property is being sold as-is. Buyer must verify zoning, boundaries, cost and availability of utilities. DIRECTIONS: Hwy 70 Solomon, take E Sanchez Rd until the pavement ends past Freeport. At the fork, take the dirt road/Earven Flat until you reach the 1st gate; use the legal easement behind the dark gray ranch house to access the 2nd gate/102 acres. Please stay on the main road to avoid trespassing. Advanced notice recommended (928) 965-4060 or (928) 432-6943.
